sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Card,List} from 'antd' import LinkButton from '../../Link-Button' import './index.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { //antd引入 LeftOutlined, } from '@ant-design/icons'; import {BASE_IMG_URL} from '../../../utils/constants' const Item =List.Item export default class Detail extends Component { render() { const {name,desc,price,detail,imgs} =this.props.location.state.product //读取路由传递过来的产品对象 const title=(    商品详情 ) return ( 商品名称: {name} 商品描述: {desc} 商品价格: {price}元 所属分类: 电脑→笔记本 商品图片: {//遍历图片数组-------------------------------------------- imgs.map(img=>( )) } 商品详情: ) } }
